name: hope (itch) (axeltornado, napsterfou, praanju)
description:
Can you escape your own dreams and nightmares and find a way to hope again? 

You are in a dream, but this one feels different. You're going to see the ups and downs of your life revealed before you like never before. Will you be able to confront your past and overcome your deepest fears? Or will you succumb to despair?

Find and use the doors as an escape from reality and move between the phases of your life. Find your way back to reality.
